name: Cliff Jumper: Narrow Escape
description:
Cliff Jumper: Narrow Escape is an amazing endless running game. Perform the cool acrobatic leap with double tap or just tap to turn or jump. Complete the ball escape to avoid all the deadly traps and obstacles and don’t get caught by the giant fire ball chasing behind!
Cliff Jumper: Narrow Escape is really an exciting and challenging endless mobile runner game!! Tap your way out and start the narrow escape! Kill your time with this incredible endless running game and relax your mind. Tap to jump or tap to turn, perform the cool acrobatic leap with double tap. Try to outrun and beat the giant fireball chasing behind you and don’t bump into deadly traps or obstacles!
Jump from the obstacle and turn at the right corner with just a tap at the right moment. Endless and ultimate joy of running and dashing missions in this free Cliff Jumper: Narrow Escape game! The best survival running game that you ever find on the app store! Get the maximum score by collecting all the coins along the way to pass the round.

Features:
- Endless running game
- Hundreds of maps to earn coins
- Chance to win big rewards in the incredible endless mode for unlimited action
- Use of skill moves (double tap) for a narrow escape
- Highly addictive unlimited and endless running gameplay
- Unlock amazing characters by spending some coins
- Daily rewards and regular updates
- Option for sharing GIFs or PNGs images with your friends online
- Leaderboards and achievements
This amazing endless running game is designed for people of all age groups. Enjoy the best ball escape adventure running game and explore the surprising features of this endless running and ball escape game!
